ExpertPDF Pdf Viewer for ASP.NET
================================

Thanks for trying ExpertPDF Pdf Viewer for ASP.NET.
At least .NET Framework 2.0 is required to be able to use it. 
The component also works with .NET 3.0, .NET 3.5 (Visual Studio 2008) and .NET 4.0. .NET 4.5, .NET 4.6 (Visual Studio 2010, 2012, 2013, 2015).

For additional support and documentation:
https://www.html-to-pdf.net/Support.aspx
https://www.html-to-pdf.net/pdf-viewer.aspx


IMPORTANT: The viewer requires the Adobe Reader to be installed on the client machine.


Licensing
---------

A serial number will be emailed to you upon purchasing. To unlock the product, you need to set in your code the serial number, like this:

pdfViewer.LicenseKey = "put your license key here";


Support
-------

For any problems, contact us: office@html-to-pdf.net

https://www.html-to-pdf.net
